title: The Infinite voyage
creator_contributor_role: National Academy of Sciences, production company
description: Focusing on current and compelling scientific topics, this series is a unique visual presentation that inspires students to see their world in new ways and discover how modern technologies contribute to scientific discovery. These programs go beyond the latest technology reports in newspapers, magazines, and television to the personal stories of people at the boundaries of scientific research. A journey to the very brink of scientific exploration where individuals and technology meet the unknown.
related_objects: Title; 304045; Unseen worlds: imaging from atoms to outer space; Active; 1987
Title; 304046; Fires of the mind: workings of the human brain; Active; 1988
